reviewText: I love everything with the Archies but I particularly love the hauntings series of Rivendale. They are fun to watch.
You know what your getting with this purchase. A few episodes on tv of a well written popular comic book. I recommend it since for the price it is worth a few watches over the years.

The vampires are loose in Archie's home town, & Veronica may be the only hope the kids have! The kids are, therefore, in a peck of trouble. This includes a 3-part episode for the "Archie's Weird Mysteries" series, plus one additional episode. Much of this material is also available on VHS.Archie's Weird Mysteries - Archie & The Riverdale Vampires The Hipster gives it a Big Thumbs UP!

Here's another Archie's Weird Mysteies and this time it has Vampire's in it but it's an great dvd and yes it's an three part series and the last one takes place in an libary and that's why it's called the Haunting of Riverdale. I have been looking for this one on dvd for an long time and I didn't think that I would ever find it but I did cause now my friends has the tape of it so grab yourself an copy of this Weird Mysteries and sitback and enjoy The Archies as they try to solved these Weird Mysteries.

  Rondall Banks
